name: Beek Widget Extention
author: Satoshi Yoshida

sections.description:
Will extend the widget of WordPress. Heading and image and category list and post list and some widget.

Features

  • Call to Action Widget
  • Cover Widget
  • Custom Post Archive Widget
  • Custom Post Category Widget
  • Custom Post List Widget
  • Heading Widget
  • Image Widget
  • Menu Widget

[Document] http://beek.jp/beek-widget-extention/

[Demo] http://beek.jp/beek-widget-extention-demo/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the beek-widget-extention folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
